text: Where can I buy the Drumstick Bites? Are they available online?
Do Drumstick Bites need to be frozen?
What is the shelf-life of Drumstick Bites?

Great question! Drumstick Bites are crispy, crunchy bite-sized mini cones filled with a chocolatey nugget – just like the end of a classic Drumstick ice cream cone! If you are looking for the Drumstick ice cream page, click herehttps://www.madewithnestle.ca/drumstick
Much like your favourite Drumstick Classic ice cream cone, these products do contain nuts (Hazelnut Paste). We always recommend checking the product packaging and ingredient list.
For nut-free alternatives, check out our KitKat Minis, Coffee Crisp Minis, Aero Minis, and Smarties pouches for a delicious chocolate snack!
Drumstick Bites are available for purchase at most major retail stores across Canada, right in the chocolate aisle!

To explore both online and in-store options, select the Products tab in the top banner and click the "Where to Buy" button below the flavour you want! A pop-up will provide options for shopping online or locating nearby stores by entering a postal code or city. Happy shopping!
​​​Not at all! Drumstick Bites are shelf-stable and can be stored at room temperature, making them a convenient snack anytime!
The shelf-life of Drumstick Bites is 12 months. Please refer to the Best Before at the back of the pouch before purchasing.
